sub_title: Helping individuals, teams and organisations improve, be agile and resilient.
summary:
At ideas at work it is our objective to enable individuals, teams and organisations to become so agile, self-organising, high performing and digital that we are no longer needed.

With enthusiasm and impact we focus on Agile Transformations and Digital Transformations as enablers for an organisation in an increasingly competitive and technology driven world. Always customer and people centric, technology enabled. We do that with knowledge and experience, some street smartness, pragmatic coaching, hands-on work in consulting or interim management. To grow people further we train and help change and adapt using Management 3.0 and Lean Change Management.

Certified Scrum Master (PSM I), Certified Scrum Product Owner (PSPO I).

Areas of expertise: Design Thinking, Agile, Scrum, building, aligning and managing diverse teams; managing projects, process and change, Lean Change Management. Commerce, Supply Chain Management, Procure to Pay / Invoice to Pay / Invoice Automation; Business Process Management; SAP technology, ERP and SCM. Data management. High Tech / Software, Retail & Distribution, logistics and manufacturing.
Speaks Dutch, English and German fluently.
